select
from product_capacity where 1=1
and code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and "work_ amount" = #{workAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and work_hour = #{workHour,jdbcType=REAL},
and efficiency = #{efficiency,jdbcType=REAL},
